JemuExpeditions.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1       Wildebeest Eco Camp     Mid-range tented camp in Nairobi (City)     Dinner Included                            Dinner Included       2       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       3       Rhino Watch Safari Lodge     Mid-range lodge less than 1hr drive from Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +5 Photos          +4 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Rhino Watch Safari Lodge     Mid-range lodge less than 1hr drive from Ol Pejeta Conservancy (Laikipia Plateau)     All Meals Included           All Meals Included       5-6       Elewana Elsa's Kopje Meru     Luxury lodge inside Meru NP     All Meals Included                   +14 Photos          +13 Photos              All Meals Included       7-8       Elewana Lewa Safari Camp     Luxury tented camp inside Lewa Conservancy (Laikipia Plateau)     All Meals Included                   +14 Photos          +13 Photos              All Meals Included       9-11       Sweetwaters Serena Camp     Luxury tented camp inside Ol Pejeta Conservancy (Laikipia Plateau)     All Meals Included                   +23 Photos          +22 Photos              All Meals Included       12       Wildebeest Eco Camp     Mid-range tented camp in Nairobi (City)     All Meals Included           All Meals Included       13      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast Included           Breakfast Included
JemuExpeditions.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees Some meals (As specified in the day-by-day section)
JemuExpeditions.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
